id.description: Unique identifier for the landing page

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the landing page was created

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the landing page was last updated

conversion_identifier.description: Identifier for the conversion action associated with this landing page

status.description: Status of the landing page (e.g., active, inactive)

has_active_experiment.description: Flag to indicate if the landing page has an active experiment running

had_experiment.description: Flag to indicate if the landing page had an experiment associated with it
